mapper.select: select login_id as nextLoginId from t_co_emp2 where login_id = #{nextLoginId}

SELECT a.dp_seq as positionSeq, a.dp_name as positionName FROM t_co_comp_duty_position_multi a WHERE a.comp_seq = #{value} AND dp_type = 'POSITION' and lang_code = 'kr'
union all
SELECT a.dp_seq as dutySeq, a.dp_name as dutyName FROM t_co_comp_duty_position_multi a WHERE a.comp_seq = #{value} AND dp_type = 'DUTY' and lang_code ='kr'

SELECT a.emp_seq as empSeq, d.main_dept_yn as mainDeptYn, d.dept_seq as deptSeq, d.biz_seq as bizSeq, f.comp_seq as compSeq, a.login_id as loginId, b.emp_name as empNameEN, c.emp_name as empNameKR, e.dept_name as deptName, f.comp_name as compName, b.main_work as mainWork, a.email_addr as emailAddr, g.dp_name as position, h.dp_name as duty, a.home_tel_num as homeTelNum, a.mobile_tel_num as mobileTelNum, a.zip_code as zipCode, c.addr as addr, c.detail_addr as detailAddr, a.bday as birth, a.join_day as joinDay, a.use_yn as useYn, a.work_status as workStatus, a.gender_code as gender, a.pic_file_id as picFile FROM t_co_emp2 a LEFT OUTER JOIN t_co_comp_duty_position_multi g ON a.position_code = g.dp_seq AND g.dp_type = 'position' AND g.lang_code = 'kr' left outer join t_co_comp_duty_position_multi h on a.duty_code = h.dp_seq and h.dp_type = 'duty' and h.lang_code = 'kr', t_co_emp_dept d, t_co_dept_multi e, t_co_comp_multi f, t_co_emp_multi b LEFT OUTER JOIN t_co_emp_multi c ON b.emp_seq = c.emp_seq AND c.lang_code = 'kr' WHERE a.emp_seq = b.emp_seq AND a.login_id = #{loginId} and d.main_dept_yn = #{mainDeptYn} AND b.lang_code = 'en' AND a.emp_seq = d.emp_seq AND d.dept_seq = e.dept_seq AND e.lang_code = 'kr' AND a.main_comp_seq = f.comp_seq AND f.lang_code = 'kr';
mapper.update: update ${table} set resign_day = ( select date_format( now(), '%Y-%m-%d') ), work_status = '001' where emp_seq = ( select empSeq from ( select a.emp_seq as empSeq from t_co_emp2 a, t_co_emp_multi b where a.emp_seq = b.emp_seq and a.login_id = #{loginId} and b.emp_name = #{empName} ) a )

choose.when: update t_co_emp_multi set emp_name = #{korea}, main_work = #{task}, addr = #{addr}, detail_addr= #{detailAddr}, modify_seq = 'admin', modify_date = now() where emp_seq = #{empSeq} and lang_code = 'kr'
choose.otherwise: update t_co_emp_multi set emp_name = #{english}, main_work = #{task}, addr = #{addr}, detail_addr= #{detailAddr}, modify_seq = 'admin', modify_date = now() where emp_seq = #{empSeq} and lang_code = 'en'
